name: Velsabor
storyline: A war between the nations of Brigan and Zojens had started. During this war a group of brigan soldiers raided an enemy base but where overpowered. During the fights the special unit Vel03, named Seldan, lost the love of his life on the battleground. In her final words she tould him, that this all useless. War can't be stopped with more war. In his anger he tries to find a way to stop these wars forever and is about to destroy the core of the problems himself and alone. When he reaches the facilities core and is about to destroy it, he and the core both vanish without a trace...
summary:
Velsabor is a game by Lachsen, started in the year 2002 and first released as a demo in 2005. It is classical RPG and is often cited as one of the best German RPG-Maker games ever to be released and won several community awards.
A final demo was released in 2013 before the game got canceled for being to ambitious for an hobby project.
